data.title: Sreemanta Sankar
data.text:
The Prime Vission of the College is to revitalize its educational leadership and transtorm the College from an institution of higher education to an institution of higher development of the intellectual will and moral commitment through continuous self-Development, Collaboration and sharing of knowledge with institutions of excellence that would place it among the most sought after institutions in the country. The aim of this College is to broaden the outlook of the students by emphasizing the age old value and virtues of life through education. Our aim is to include positive thinking, develop analytical skills, moral, social and aesthetic values in them. We look the Himalayan task on their shoulder to indicate age old desk of ignorance by establishing their College. Our aim to make India one of the develop countries by moulding the boys and girls in international level wealth. For the teachers of this College, teaching is a religion, a lifetime commitment, a victim and a profession and not just an occupation. The teachers strike to keep the latest development in their own fields.

The Prime Vission of the College is to revitalize its educational leadership and transtorm the College from an institution of higher education to an institution of higher development of the intellectual will and moral commitment through continuous self-Development, Collaboration and sharing of knowledge with institutions of excellence that would place it among the most sought after institutions in the country. The College caters the educational requirement of the people of vast areas spreading from Bhatkuchi, Mandia, Dongra, Dighirpam, Palhazi, Tetlirtal on the northern bank of the river Brahmaputra and Jahurpam, Jania, Kadong the western side of Satra Nagari Barpeta Town. It also Caters Patbaushi, Major Gaon, Kahibari, Nangalkur etc. locations in the northern side of it and all the rural areas of its eastern direction as well. The SSM College is situated in the very remote rural area which is totally backward economically, educationally and socially in Barpeta District. It aspires to be recognised in its quality teaching to a diverse student, population so as to enable them to realise and develop their internal and potential capabilities. Our aim is to expand the education to student of poor family whose guardians are below the povertyline.
